Gavin Wray

About me

Hi, I’m Gavin, a content designer at Kainos. I help clients to simplify their services with clear language and user-centred design.

I’m currently working with Homes England on affordable home ownership schemes.

Previously I have:

  • worked with NHS Digital to design the NHS App
  • led content design and technical writing projects at the University of Warwick
  • coordinated development of an impact assessment app through alpha and private beta stages
  • run a monthly social media surgery for community groups in Birmingham, the first of its kind in the UK and part of a movement recognised with a Prime Minister’s Big Society Award

Outside all this, I love playing the guitar, recording as Final Pilots, nature and walks with my dog.
